info.author: Alexander Groddeck
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.keywords: django,file upload,file upload validation,restricted file upload,file upload sanitization,file upload filtering,file upload security
info.name: django-middleware-fileuploadvalidation
info.summary: A modular Django middleware to validate user file uploads, detect specially crafted media files with malicious intent and either sanitize or block them afterward.
